channel.title: Suggestion - Factions
channel.description: Ok, I think that when a faction has been formed and is [u]successfully growing[/u], it should get it's own sub-board here. This can be used for specific clan discussion, raids, ect. Only people who are part of that faction and have been by faction leader(s) can have access to that topic. Not much else to it... anything else? Share ideas

item.title: Suggestion - Factions
item.dc:creator: @cocoa cocoa
item.description:
@cocoa wrote:

reyx, it would be a pain in the ass to create a board everytime a new faction became popular.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @ranger_squad ranger squad
item.description:

What is the punishment for attacking without warning? (Could I be temporarily unbanned just for a day, to check on Haven? Cheers in advance.)

item.title: Suggestion - Factions
item.dc:creator: @noobs_are_ftw noobs are ftw
item.description:
@noobs_are_ftw wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:27, topic:380458”]I think that plugin would be great davidi. Write it for bukkit though and we will switch.

Anyway, I think fair warnings for attacks are good. The few times my clan raided varrock, we always gave fair warning before we even left the castle to be sure they were ok with it. It’s just the nice thing to do.

Plus, if your clan is as good as you think they are, they wouldn’t need to surprise people to kill them. ;)[/quote]

was mdog wit u guys?

when he raided i got no warning

Read full topic

item.title: Suggestion - Factions
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

I think that plugin would be great davidi. Write it for bukkit though and we will switch.

Anyway, I think fair warnings for attacks are good. The few times my clan raided varrock, we always gave fair warning before we even left the castle to be sure they were ok with it. It’s just the nice thing to do.

Plus, if your clan is as good as you think they are, they wouldn’t need to surprise people to kill them.

Read full topic

item.title: Suggestion - Factions
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”][quote author=reyx7 link=topic=476288.msg3484392#msg3484392 date=1296431565]

To keep us from climbing over they could put a 3 width lava moat, or things like that.

Do you know how easy it is to climb over stuff like that?

And fill it with mobs.
[/quote]How do you plan on filling a lava moat with mobs? Lava would kill them.[/quote]

I’m kidding…

Yea the best way is to dig into a mountain and have an internal layer of obsidian along with an elaborate scheme of lava to assume were the enemy would fall in, and have various working hidden entrances.

Read full topic

item.title: Suggestion - Factions
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“reyx7, post:17, topic:380458”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=476288.msg3484258#msg3484258 date=1296424237]

If PVP is removed, factions will be pointless.
[/quote]I’ve been thinking of writing a plugin. It would obviously need to be re-written when Bukkit is released, but it goes something like this:
It can store factions with a leader, and then members, which will be used throughout the plugin.
People that want to join a faction can do something like /apply factionname, and a request will be sent to the faction owner.
Faction leaders (and maybe create like a rank system, for others as well?) can do something like /challenge factionname and it will send a message to all the members of both factions ("____ is going to attack ____! You have 15 minutes to prepare!") , and start like a 10/15 minute timer. When that timer expires, another message is sent and the members of the factions are allowed to attack eachother for another 10/15 minute period. It would store all the members of the faction, and when all of them have been killed once, it will say which clan is victorious.

The akatsuki are based on assassination… we never warn our enemies when we plan to attack.[/quote]Which is why a lot of people have left, they don’t like being killed when they just want to build.

Read full topic
